page.title: 12THE SOURCE OF THE THAMES
page.content:
{ THE SOURCE OF THE THAMES. { THE SOURCE OF THE THAMES CAN BE FOUND NEAR COATES. IT IS NECESSARY TO TAKE FOOTPATHS ACROSS FIELDS TO REACH THE SPRING FROM WHICH THE THAMES RISES. THE SPOT IS MARKED BY A STONE. A STATUE OF FATHER THAMES USED TO BE AT THE SPOT BUT WAS MOVED TO LECHLADE SOME YEARS AGO AFTER BEING DAMAGED.
{THE THAMES AND SEVERN CANAL.} NEARBY IS PART OF THE OLD THAMES AND SEVERN CANAL.IT WAS OPENED IN 1789 AND IS NOW OVERGROWN.WALK ALONG THE BANKS, PAST THE OLD RUINS OF THE ROUND HOUSE AND UNDER THE BRIDGE, BEFORE CLIMBING UP TO THE TUNNEL HOUSE. THIS PUBLIC HOUSE, WHICH WAS ONCE USED BY THE BARGEES, IS NEAR THE TUNNEL WHICH PASSES THROUGH THE HILLSIDE TO SAPPERTON.
